item.title: Daniel Dorey Rodriguez
item.description: A little about me… Some general fiels of interest include: Economics, Statistics, History, and Data Science. More specifically, I’m interesting in leveraging data to shatter conventional wisdoms across a series of domains. At the core of my thinking lies a belief in the heteredox. In other words, I reject that the intellectual fruit worth picking has already been picked. If it has, what are we all doing? In my little way, I hope, via my blog posts and through my educational and professional life, to influence positively those with whom I come into contact.
